RecklessCleave.NAME: Reckless Cleave
RecklessCleave.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Deal !D! damage to a target then deal !D! damage to all enemies

GreaterCleave.NAME: Greater Cleave
GreaterCleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice.

Rampage.NAME: RAMPAGE
Rampage.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. Draw a card. Deal !D! damage.

QuickFix.NAME: Quick Fix
QuickFix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. Shuffle 2 Wounds into your drawpile.

AxeAQuestion.NAME: Axe A Question
AxeAQuestion.DESCRIPTION: Applies !M! Weak and Vulnerable to target.

Panic.NAME: Panic
Panic.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 Dazed into your drawpile. Gain !M! Regen.

Revenge.NAME: Revenge
Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to life lost this combat
Revenge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double the amount of life lost this combat

WhirlwindOfDeath.NAME: Whirlwind Of Death
WhirlwindOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double the amount of life lost this combat
